hero.title: Hi, I'm Flor
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Enthusiast
hero.description: Passionate about creating innovative solutions that combine technology with sustainability. Specializing in React, TypeScript, Python, and AI-driven development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a passionate developer with 7+ years of experience, combining my love for technology with a strong focus on sustainability and innovation. Currently working as a board member of a live group and for Electrostock, while pursuing my own projects like Parksports and Immogen.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.summary: Continuously expanding my skill set and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and maintainable solutions with a focus on sustainability and AI integration.

timeline.title: My Journey
timeline.nextChapterDescription: My journey in technology continues with a passion for innovation, sustainability, and growth. Always excited to take on new challenges and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference.

event1.title: Board Member LifeGroup + ElectroStock
event1.description: First year working as board member of LifeGroup and work for ElectroStock. Combining programming experience with board responsibilities.

event2.title: Web Development Education
event2.description: 4 years of web development education completed with diploma. Focus on modern web technologies and practical projects.

event3.title: Plant Technical Sciences
event3.description: 2 years of education in plant technical sciences completed with diploma. Focus on sustainability and technology.

event4.title: Start as Programmer
event4.description: Started programming in high school. First steps in the world of software development.

goals.title: Goals & Vision
goals.subtitle: Building a sustainable future through technology
goals.vijverstofzuigersDesc: Further develop and expand my pool cleaning robot projects, improving efficiency and sustainability.
goals.robotsBouwenDesc: Create additional robotic solutions for various applications, focusing on automation and sustainability.
goals.soloprojectenDesc: Finish development of Parksports and Immogen projects, bringing them to full completion.
goals.parksportsCommunityDesc: Create and grow a community around the Parksports project, engaging users and contributors.
goals.immogenSamenwerkersDesc: Identify and onboard team members to help develop and scale the Immogen project.
goals.properheidAardeDesc: Make a meaningful contribution to keeping our planet clean through technology and innovation.
goals.ecologischePlaneetDesc: Work towards a more sustainable and ecological future through technological solutions.
goals.aiDrivenBusinessDesc: Establish and lead a technology business that leverages AI to create innovative solutions.
goals.recognitionNaamDesc: Build a recognized name and leave a lasting legacy in the technology and sustainability space.
goals.duurzaamheidDesc: Prioritize environmental responsibility in all technological solutions and projects.
goals.innovatieDesc: Always push the boundaries of what's possible with technology and creative problem-solving.
goals.kwaliteitDesc: Focus on creating meaningful, well-crafted solutions that make a real difference.
goals.visionDescription: I envision a future where technology seamlessly enhances human creativity and productivity while preserving our planet. By combining cutting-edge development practices with a deep understanding of sustainability, I aim to create digital experiences that not only solve problems but inspire and contribute to a better world. My goal is to be at the forefront of this transformation, building bridges between complex technology, intuitive user experiences, and environmental responsibility.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your next project
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contact.name: Name

footer.description: Building the future, one line of code at a time.
